title: Gannett 's revenue 2013 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 3.15 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 2.92 was reported at Year 2018
